description: Unit test class for TodoController using MockMvc, testing API endpoints related to todo items in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: TodoControllerTest
classes.description: JUnit test class for the TodoController, testing various CRUD API endpoints with mock services and request/response assertions

methods.name: buildPersisted
methods.description: Helper method to create a persisted Todo object with specified id and title for testing.

methods.name: create_success_shouldReturn201AndBody
methods.description: Test the creation of a Todo item, expecting a 201 status and correct response body.

methods.name: create_validationError_shouldReturn400WithErrors
methods.description: Test validation error handling during Todo creation, expecting a 400 status.

methods.name: list_success_shouldReturn200AndArray
methods.description: Test the listing of todos, expecting a 200 status and an array response.

methods.name: getById_notFound_shouldReturn404
methods.description: Test retrieval of a non-existent Todo by ID, expecting a 404 Not Found response.

methods.name: put_success_shouldReturnUpdatedResponse
methods.description: Test updating an existing Todo with PUT request, expecting updated data in response.

methods.name: put_missingTitle_shouldMapIllegalArgumentTo400
methods.description: Test handling of IllegalArgumentException during PUT update, expecting a 400 response.

methods.name: patch_success_shouldReturnUpdatedResponse
methods.description: Test partial update (PATCH) of a Todo, expecting updated fields.

methods.name: toggleComplete_shouldReturnUpdatedState
methods.description: Test toggling the complete state of a Todo.

methods.name: delete_success_shouldReturn204
methods.description: Test deletion of a Todo, expecting a 204 No Content response.
